casebody.data:
TREJO
v.
NC DEPARTMENT OF STATE TREASURER RETIREMENT SYSTEM DIVISION 420P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2018 Ms. Susannah P. Holloway, Assistant Attorney General, Ms. M.A. Kelly Chambers, Special Deputy Attorney General, Mr. James W. Doggett, Deputy Solicitor General, for NC Department of State Treasurer Retirement Systems Division

Mr. Branch W. Vincent, III, Southern Shores, Mr. John R. Taylor, Mr. Robert E. Zaytoun, Mr. Matthew D. Ballew, Raleigh, Attorneys at Law, For Trejo, Stephanie T.

Mr. M. Jackson Nichols, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for State Employees Association of North Carolina, Inc.

*853The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of February 2018 by State Employees Association of North Carolina Inc. and for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief in Support of Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2018."
